Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

Post.title: vue
Post.content:
vue


1VuedatagettersetterVue
2ObserverdatadataObjectdefinePropertygetsetgetset
3compilerv-
4ObserverdatagetsetDep
5dataWatcherDepWatcher

vue

1

myVue.html

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>Title</title>
</head>
<body>
    <div id="app">
        <div></div>
        <div>{{name}}</div>
        <div>{{age}}</div>
        <div>v-text</div>
        <div v-text="name"></div>
        <div v-text="age"></div>
        <div>v-html</div>
        <div v-html="name"></div>
        <div v-html="age"></div>
        <div>v-model</div>
        <input type="text" v-model="name">
        <input type="text" v-model="age">
    </div>
    <script src="./js/dep.js"></script>
    <script src="./js/watcher.js"></script>
    <script src="./js/compiler.js"></script>
    <script src="./js/observer.js"></script>
    <script src="./js/myVue.js"></script>
<script>
    const vm = new MyVue({
        el: '#app',
        data: {
            name: '',
            age: 50,
            son: {
                name: '',
                age: 25
            }
        }
    })
</script>
</body>
</html>

2myVue

js/myVue.js

class MyVue {
  constructor(options) {
      // vuevue
      this.$options = options || {};
      this.$data = options.data || {};
      // eldom
      this.$el = typeof options.el === 'string' ? document.querySelector(options.el) : options.el;
      // datagettersetter, vue
      this._proxyData(this.$data);
      // data
      new Observer(this.$data);
      // 
      new Compiler(this);
  }
  _proxyData(data) {
      Object.keys(data).forEach(key => {
          Object.defineProperty(this, key, {
              enumerable: true,
              configurable: true,
              set(v) {
                  if (v === data[key]) return;
                  data[key] = v;
              },
              get() {
                  return data[key];
              }
          })
      })
  }
}

3Observer

js/Observer.js

class Observer {
  constructor(data) {
      this.walk(data);
  }
  walk(data) {
      if (!data || typeof data !== 'object') return;
      Object.keys(data).forEach(key => {
          this.defineReactive(data, key, data[key]);
      })
  }
  // val,data[key]get,set
  defineReactive(data, key, val) {
      let self = this;
      // 
      this.walk(val);
      // datadep
      let dep = new Dep();
      Object.defineProperty(data, key, {
          enumerable: true,
          configurable: true,
          set(v) {
              if (v === val) return;
              val = v;
              // 
              self.walk(v);
              // datasetnotify
              dep.notify();
          },
          get() {
              // watcherDeptargetdata[key]get
              // 
              Dep.target && dep.subs.push(Dep.target);
              return val;
          }
      })
  }
}

4Compiler

js/compiler.js

class Compiler {
    constructor(vm) {
        this.vm = vm;
        this.el = vm.$el;
        this.compile(this.el);
    }
    compile(el) {
        let childNodes = el.childNodes;
        Array.from(childNodes).forEach(node => {
            if (this.isTextNode(node)) {
                this.compileText(node);
            } else if (this.isElementNode(node))  {
                this.compileElement(node);
            }
            // 
            if (node.childNodes && node.childNodes.length) {
                this.compile(node);
            }
        })
    }
    // 
    compileText(node) {
        let reg = /\{\{(.+?)\}\}/; // {{ xxx }}
        let value = node.textContent;
        if (reg.test(value)) {
            let key = RegExp.$1.trim();
            node.textContent = value.replace(reg, this.vm[key]);
            // data
            new Watcher(this.vm, key, newValue => {
                node.textContent = newValue;
            });
        }
    }
    // 
    compileElement(node) {
        let attrs = node.attributes;
        Array.from(attrs).forEach(attr => {
            let attrName = attr.name;
            if (this.isDirective(attrName)) {
                attrName = attrName.substr(2);
                let key = attr.value;
                this.update(node, key, attrName);
            }
        })
    }
    // ifxxxUpdater
    update(node, key, attrName) {
        let updateFn = this[attrName + 'Updater'];
        updateFn && updateFn.call(this, node, this.vm[key], key);
    }
    // v-text
    textUpdater(node, val, key) {
        node.textContent = val;
        // data
        new Watcher(this.vm, key, newValue => {
            node.textContent = newValue;
        })
    }
    // v-html
    htmlUpdater(node, val, key) {
        // data
        node.innerHTML = val;
        new Watcher(this.vm, key, newValue => {
            node.innerHTML = newValue;
        })
    }
    // v-model
    modelUpdater(node, val, key) {
        node.value = val;
        // data
        new Watcher(this.vm, key, newValue => {
            node.value = newValue;
        })
        // 
        node.addEventListener('input', () => {
            this.vm[key] = node.value;
        })
    }
    // 
    isTextNode(node) {
        return node.nodeType === 3;
    }
    // 
    isElementNode(node) {
        return node.nodeType === 1;
    }
    // vue
    isDirective(attrName) {
        return attrName.startsWith('v-');
    }
}

5Dep

js/dep.js

class Dep {
    constructor() {
        // 
        this.subs = [];
    }
    // 
    addSub(sub) {
        // update
        if (sub && sub.update) {
            this.subs.push(sub);
        } 
    }
    // update
    notify() {
        this.subs.forEach(sub => {
            sub.update();
        })
    }
}

6Watcher

js/watcher.js

class Watcher {
    // cbupdate
    constructor(vm, key, cb) {
        this.vm = vm;
        this.key = key;
        this.cb = cb;
        // targetdate[key]getsubs
        Dep.target = this;
        this.oldValue = vm[key];
        // target
        Dep.target = null;
    }
    update() {
        let newValue = this.vm[this.key];
        if (newValue === this.oldValue) return;
        this.cb(newValue);
    }
}

7

vue

  constructor(data) {

  }
  walk(data) {

      //

      Object.defineProperty(data, key, {

4Compiler

js/compiler.js

class Compiler {
    constructor(vm) {
        this.vm = vm;
        this.el = vm.$el;
        this.compile(this.el);
    }
    compile(el) {
        let childNodes = el.childNodes;
        Array.from(childNodes).forEach(node => {
            if (this.isTextNode(node)) {
                this.compileText(node);
            } else if (this.isElementNode(node))  {
                this.compileElement(node);
            }
            // 
            if (node.childNodes && node.childNodes.length) {
                this.compile(node);
            }
        })
    }
    // 
    compileText(node) {
        let reg = /\{\{(.+?)\}\}/; // {{ xxx }}
        let value = node.textContent;
        if (reg.test(value)) {
            let key = RegExp.$1.trim();
            node.textContent = value.replace(reg, this.vm[key]);
            // data
            new Watcher(this.vm, key, newValue => {
                node.textContent = newValue;
            });
        }
    }
    // 
    compileElement(node) {
        let attrs = node.attributes;
        Array.from(attrs).forEach(attr => {
            let attrName = attr.name;
            if (this.isDirective(attrName)) {
                attrName = attrName.substr(2);
                let key = attr.value;
                this.update(node, key, attrName);
            }
        })
    }
    // ifxxxUpdater
    update(node, key, attrName) {
        let updateFn = this[attrName + 'Updater'];
        updateFn && updateFn.call(this, node, this.vm[key], key);
    }
    // v-text
    textUpdater(node, val, key) {
        node.textContent = val;
        // data
        new Watcher(this.vm, key, newValue => {
            node.textContent = newValue;
        })
    }
    // v-html
    htmlUpdater(node, val, key) {
        // data
        node.innerHTML = val;
        new Watcher(this.vm, key, newValue => {
            node.innerHTML = newValue;
        })
    }
    // v-model
    modelUpdater(node, val, key) {
        node.value = val;
        // data
        new Watcher(this.vm, key, newValue => {
            node.value = newValue;
        })
        // 
        node.addEventListener('input', () => {
            this.vm[key] = node.value;
        })
    }
    // 
    isTextNode(node) {
        return node.nodeType === 3;
    }
    // 
    isElementNode(node) {
        return node.nodeType === 1;
    }
    // vue
    isDirective(attrName) {
        return attrName.startsWith('v-');
    }
}

class Watcher {

    constructor(vm, key, cb) {
        this.vm = vm;
        this.key = key;
        this.cb = cb;
        // targetdate[key]getsubs
        Dep.target = this;
        this.oldValue = vm[key];

        Dep.target = null;
    }
    update() {
        let newValue = this.vm[this.key];
        if (newValue === this.oldValue) return;
        this.cb(newValue);
    }
}
